about_the_game:
Classic bricks breaker game enriched with weapons and much more. You can decide what features will be added to this game!

If you can't break a brick using your ball throw second one, or you can shot them using a rifle, plasma gun, or burn down by laser.
To not make your play so easy, there are some enemies waiting for you!

# 50 levels, and next 50 levels (100 in total) if more than 100 players finish all levels (so if You like this game and want more, share it to Your Friends)
# Steam achievements, leader board and cloud save
# 3 types of ball with different power and abilities:
-- standard
-- spikeball (weaker, but dangerous against You)
-- fire-ball (destroy everything on the way, taking a little damage)
# 5 weapons:
-- short gun
-- machine gun
-- plasma gun
-- plasma machine gun
-- laser (low damage but ultra fire rate, fry them all)
# 4 types of upgradeable sticks with different strength
-- bamboo
-- wooden
-- metal
-- kevlar
# 14 game play bonuses
-- snail - slow down ball, could be annoying ;)
-- grow up - makes your stick longer
-- change any ball to fireball
-- ball multiplication
-- first aid - heal your stick
-- increase enemies fire rate
-- flip screen
-- increase ball speed, could be hard do control
-- shrink - makes your stick shorter
-- change a ball to spikeball
-- under stick protection
-- shield - 100% stick protection
-- decrease enemies fire rate
-- activate fans under the stick
# 12 bonuses before each level for each player who capture a new player*
-- additional stick (4 types)
-- double coins
-- full health!
-- stick speed-up
-- pistol
-- plasma gun
-- laser!
-- all ammo types
-- 10 additional balls
-- random amount of coins
-- random amount of cash
-- random amount of points
# 3 types of enemies
-- flying enemy
-- machine gun
-- plasma gun
# other objects:
-- Teleports
-- Black Wholes
-- Fans

* if someone download this game and enter Your sharing code, then both players receive bonus before each level. This functionality works on 3rd part server, and it's not guarantee

Classic bricks breaker game enriched with weapons and much more. You can decide what features will be added to this game!

If you can't break a brick using your ball throw second one, or you can shot them using a rifle, plasma gun, or burn down by laser.
To not make your play so easy, there are some enemies waiting for you!

# 50 levels, and next 50 levels (100 in total) if more than 100 players finish all levels (so if You like this game and want more, share it to Your Friends)

name: 4K Bricks Breaker Plus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Atom x5 1.44Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 940M or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: not required
  • Additional Notes: may work with weaker graphic ; game use up to 1GB RAM, 2GB is minimum including OS consumption
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Atom x5 1.44Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 940M or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Classic bricks breaker game expanded by weapons and much more.You can decide what will be added to this game!
